unit.creator: Philodemus || Ranocchia, Graziano et Vassallo, Christian
unit.title: De rhetorica || Col. 71 PHerc. 1004 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ]μ[ +2 ][ +1 asc. 2 ]α[ +2 dext. sup. horiz. [ +1 inf. vert., inf. arcus vel bracchium, (ο, β) 3 ]ανε[ +1 inf. vest., inf. vest., (ε, θ), vert. 4 ]οι[ +1 5 ][]ρα +2 (ϲ, ε), sin. sup. arcus, (ο, ε, θ, ϲ) 6 ][₍₎]υτ[ +2 sup. vest., sin. ramus, desc., (ο, θ, ω), inf. arcus, sup. arcus 7 ]α[]ωιϲχ[ +2 dext. sup. arcus, (γ, ρ, π) 8 ορω[]φοικ+2 (τ, π, γ), sin. inf. vert., sup. arcus 9 ]α[₍₎][ +2 (δ, β), (π, τι, γι), sup. vest. 10 ]ε[]α[ +2 inf. vest., (ϲ, ε), (ϲ, ο), (ζ, δ), inf. arcus ]ναιδ[ -1 11 ]υϲινα[ +2 (κ, ν) 12 ]μ[ +2 sup. horiz., inf. desc., sup. asc. 13 ]ω[]ϲυϲ[ +2 sin. inf. desc. vel arcus 14 ][ +2 inf. uncus 15[ +2 inf. vest. 16 ]ε +1 17 ][]+1 sup. horiz., (ο, ϲ), sup. arcus 18 ]αι+1 (τ, γ, π)
